::DarkMouse:;

She sat there in the clearing with Scorponok.  She watched as the 
wolf came by and brought back to her her pet.  She picked up the rat 
and nuzzled it.  She loked up at Scorponok.  Her body felt rather 
numb.  So did her head.  This was a lot to take in and she wan't 
really ready for the wave of memory and mothion to hit her. But it 
did an it hit like a run away frieght train.

She sat there holding her pet and looking up at Scorponok.
Again she asked him, "Why?"
